title: 65 - When Does God Answer Prayer?
description:
In this episode we visit a question submitted from VOX Community regarding prayer.  When does God answer prayer? Why does He answer other prayers and not yours?  Why does he seem to answer our small prayers, and not answer those in the trenches of tragedy like Aleppo.  We offer a couple bad answers to these, and perhaps the right one.  Looking forward to your comments and thoughts!

- Mike Erre
